resources.string:
Hi, my name is Pavel! 

I love riding. 

I am riding on all awailable things for me. 

I like to ride a bicycle, like drive a car, motorcycle. 

I like snowboarding. I was in many beautiful places. 

I like skating. I can skating everywhere, it is named free skating. 

Ice skating else my passion, I like rotating and learn sothing new. 

Another my love is computers. 
I like tuning computers, play games, programming. I started course for increase in Android developing. I think soon I can find new work, that can permit me live every where and riding what I want and where I want.
